test_uart_rx.help: UART RX pin for sim5320. It should be used for library tests only

test_uart_tx.help: UART TX pin for sim5320. It should be used for library tests only

test_reset_pin.help: RESET pin of sim5320. SET to NC it isn't availible.It should be used for library tests only

test_sim_pin.help: SIM pin. It it's is empty, then it's ignored. It should be used for library tests only

test_sim_subscriber_number.help: The sim card subscriber number for SMS testing. The special value "CNUM" can be used to extract subscriber number from SIM card if it's available.

test_apn.help: APN name. It should be used for library tests only

test_apn_username.help: APN username. It should be used for library tests only

test_apn_password.help: APN password. It should be used for library tests only

test_ftp_connect_ftp_url.help: FTP URL to test ftp connection

test_ftp_connect_ftps_explicit_url.help: FTP URL to test explicit ftps connection

test_ftp_connect_ftps_implicit_url.help: FTP URL to test implicit ftps connection

test_ftp_read_write_operations_url.help: FTP URL to test write/read operations. If it isn't set, tests will be skipped. A user should have a read/write permissions.

test_ftp_read_write_operations_dir.help: FTP URL to test write/read operations
